mil7.5.3:5.1: “Bhante nāgasena, ‘undūrassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban’ti yaṃ vadesi, katamaṃ taṃ ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabban”ti?
mil7.5.3:5.2: “Yathā, mahārāja, undūro itocito ca vicaranto āhārūpāsīsako yeva carati;
mil7.5.3:5.3: evameva kho, mahārāja, yoginā yogāvacarena itocito ca vicarantena yoniso manasikārūpāsīsakeneva bhavitabbaṃ.
mil7.5.3:5.4: Idaṃ, mahārāja, undūrassa ekaṃ aṅgaṃ gahetabbaṃ.
